description.english: Meet the Heroes and discover their skillsets
description.tchinese: 發現英雄及他們的特殊能力。
description.german: Triff die Helden und entdecke ihre Fähigkeiten
description.french: Rencontrez les héros et découvrez leurs compétences
description.spanish: Conoce a los héroes y descubre sus habilidades.
description.russian: Познакомьтесь с героями и их навыками
description.brazilian: Conheça os Heróis e descubra suas habilidades
description.polish: Poznaj bohaterów i odkryj ich zdolności
description.italian: Incontra gli eroi e scopri le loro abilità
description.japanese: ヒーローに会い、スキルセットを発見しよう。
description.schinese: 初见主角并了解他们的能力

description.english: Take part in weavlings' ritual.
description.german: Nimm am Ritual der Weavelings teil
description.french: Prenez part au rituel Weaveling.
description.spanish: Participa en el ritual de los weavelings.
description.brazilian: Participe do ritual dos tecelões.
description.italian: Partecipa al rituale dei Weaveling
description.japanese: Weavlingsの儀式に参加しよう。
description.schinese: 参与Weaveling树精的仪式

displayName.french: Ce n'est pas que de la musique
displayName.japanese: ただの音楽ではありません

description.english: Finish handpan puzzle.
description.german: Löse das Handpan-Puzzle
description.french: Résolvez des énigmes en jouant du handpan.
description.spanish: Resuelve el puzle del handpan.
description.brazilian: Termine o quebra-cabeça do handpan.
description.italian: Completa il puzzle dell'handpan
description.japanese: ハンドペンのパズルを完了させよう。
description.schinese: 解开音碟谜题

description.english: Discover ancient technology.
description.german: Mobilisiere antike Technologie
description.french: Mettez en marche d'anciennes technologies.
description.spanish: Activa la tecnología antigua.
description.brazilian: Dê energia à tecnologia antiga.
description.italian: Aziona l'antica tecnologia
description.japanese: 古代の技術をパワーアップ。
description.schinese: 激活古代科技

description.english: Safely cross through the water land.
description.german: Durchquere sicher das Wasserland
description.french: Franchissez le pays de l'eau sain et sauf.
description.spanish: Cruza el mundo marino con éxito.
description.brazilian: Cruze o terreno alagado em segurança.
description.italian: Attraversa in sicurezza le terre acquose
description.japanese: ウォーターランドを無事に通過しよう。
description.schinese: 安全通过水丘区域

displayName.japanese: 異なるレベルのパートナーシップ

description.english: Finish pergolas maze
description.german: Schließe das Pergolas-Labyrinth ab
description.french: Sortez du labyrinthe de pergolas
description.spanish: Completa el laberinto de la pérgola.
description.brazilian: Termine o labirinto de pérgolas
description.italian: Completa il labirinto di pergole
description.japanese: パーゴラの迷路を完了させよう。
description.schinese: 通过绿廊迷宫

description.english: Get out of creepy jungle.
description.german: Finde aus dem unheimlichen Dschungel heraus
description.french: Traversez une jungle lugubre.
description.spanish: Sal de la siniestra jungla.
description.brazilian: Saia da selva aterrorizante.
description.italian: Esci dalla giungla paurosa
description.japanese: 不気味なジャングルから脱出しよう。
description.schinese: 穿过阴森丛林

description.english: Discover ancient ruins.
description.german: Entdecke antike Ruinen
description.french: Explorez d'anciennes ruines.
description.spanish: Descubre las ruinas antiguas.
description.brazilian: Descubra ruínas antigas.
description.italian: Scopri le antiche rovine
description.japanese: 古代遺跡を発見しよう。
description.schinese: 发现古代遗迹

displayName.english: Kids are too lazy to walk.
displayName.german: Kinder sind zu faul zum Laufen
displayName.french: Les enfants sont trop fainéants pour marcher.
displayName.italian: Questi giovani sono troppo pigri per camminare
displayName.japanese: 子供たちは歩くのが面倒です。

description.english: Finish canals puzzle.
description.german: Schließe das Kanäle-Puzzle ab
description.french: Résolvez les énigmes des canaux.
description.spanish: Resuelve el puzle de las canales.
description.brazilian: Termine o quebra-cabeça dos canais.
description.italian: Completa il puzzle dei canali
description.japanese: 運河のパズルを完了させよう。
description.schinese: 解开水道谜题

description.english: Find the cool way to ancient city.
description.german: Finde den Weg zur antiken Stadt
description.french: Trouvez le chemin menant jusqu'à l'ancienne ville.
description.spanish: Encuentra la forma de entrar en la ciudad antigua.
description.brazilian: Encontre o caminho para a cidade antiga.
description.italian: Trova la strada per l'antica città
description.japanese: 古代都市への道を見つけよう。
description.schinese: 抵达古代城市

displayName.japanese: 暗闇に包まれた世界、私の慣れ親しんだ世界です

description.english: Help Deaf to go through press machines.
description.german: Hilf Taub durch die Pressen
description.french: Aidez Sourd à traverser de dangereuses presses.
description.spanish: Ayuda a Sordo a utilizar los mecanismos de presión.
description.brazilian: Ajude Surdo a passar pelas máquinas de prensa
description.polish: Pomóż niesłyszącemu przedostać się przez prasy
description.italian: Aiuta Sordo ad attraversare le presse
description.japanese: デフを助けてプレス機を通過しよう。
description.schinese: 帮助失聪穿过冲压机区域

displayName.english: At the edge of the tree

description.english: Reach your target destination.
description.german: Erreiche deinen Zielort
description.french: Rejoignez votre destination.
description.spanish: Alcanza tu lugar de destino.
description.brazilian: Alcance seu destino
description.italian: Raggiungi la tua destinazione
description.japanese: 目標地点に到達しよう。
description.schinese: 抵达你们的最终目的地

description.english: Detach all rotten pipes to save bastion's heart.
description.tchinese: 拆除所有腐蝕的管子，保護堡壘之心。
description.german: Trenne alle verrotteten Röhren, um Bastions Herz zu retten
description.french: Détachez tous les tuyaux abîmés pour sauver le cœur de la forteresse.
description.spanish: Desconecta todos los conductos podridos para salvar el corazón de la fortaleza.
description.russian: Удалите все гнилые трубы, чтобы спасти сердце бастиона.
description.brazilian: Desconecte os canos apodrecidos para salvar o coração do bastião
description.polish: Odłącz wszystkie rury ze zgnilizną, by ocalić serce bastionu
description.italian: Stacca tutte le tubature marcie per salvare il cuore del bastione
description.japanese: 全ての腐ったパイプを取り外して、バスチオン・ハートを守ろう。
description.schinese: 拆下所有腐朽管道以拯救堡垒之心

description.english: Scare away sleeping bugs
description.german: Verscheuche die schlafenden Würmer
description.french: Faites fuir les vers endormis
description.spanish: Espanta a las sierpes durmientes.
description.brazilian: Assuste os vermes-lesmas adormecidos
description.italian: Spaventa i vermoni dormienti
description.japanese: 眠っているワームを驚かせて追い払おう
description.schinese: 吓走沉睡蠕虫

displayName.french: Des choses que vous ne pourriez imaginer.
displayName.brazilian: Coisas que não dá para acreditar.

description.english: We've seen things that you weavelings wouldn't believe.
description.tchinese: 我們的見識遠遠超過你們這些weaveling。
description.german: Wir haben Dinge gesehen, die ihr Weavelings nicht glauben würdet
description.french: Nous avons vu tant de choses que vous, Weavelings, ne pourriez imaginer.
description.spanish: Hemos visto cosas que vosotros, weavelings, no creeríais.
description.russian: Нам встречались вещи, о которых вы, веточники, даже не подозревали.
description.brazilian: Vimos coisas que vocês, tecelões, não acreditariam.
description.polish: Widzieliśmy rzeczy, którym wy oplotki nie dalibyście wiary.
description.italian: Abbiamo visto cose che nessun Weaveling potrebbe immaginare
description.japanese: Weavelingたちが信じてくれなそうなことを目撃した。
description.schinese: 我们见过普通Weaveling树精无法想象的事物

description.english: Watch all micro stories recorded by ancients.
description.tchinese: 觀看所有先祖錄下的小故事。
description.german: Sieh dir alle Kurzgeschichten der Antike an
description.french: Regardez toutes les micro-histoires enregistrées par les anciens.
description.spanish: Mira todas las pequeñas historias grabadas por los antiguos.
description.brazilian: Assista a todas as micro-histórias gravadas pelos antigos.
description.polish: Zobacz wszystkie historie zapisane przez starożytnych
description.italian: Guarda tutte le mini storie registrate dagli antichi
description.japanese: 古代人によって記録された、全てのミニストーリーを見よう。
description.schinese: 观赏古代先民录下的所有小故事

description.english: Paint a poser in village.
description.tchinese: 在村莊為一位模特作畫。
description.german: Male ein Modell im Dorf
description.french: Peignez un modèle dans le village.
description.spanish: Pinta a un weaveling en el pueblo.
description.brazilian: Pinte um modelo na aldeia.
description.italian: Dipingi il modello che posa nel villaggio
description.japanese: 村の気取り屋をペイントしよう。
description.schinese: 在村子里给1位模特作画

description.english: Have you seen what I've heard?
description.tchinese: 你看見我聽到什麼了嗎？
description.german: Hast du gesehen, was ich gehört habe?
description.french: As-tu vu ce que j'ai entendu ?
description.spanish: ¿Has visto lo que he oído?
description.russian: Видно ли тебе то, что слышно мне?
description.brazilian: Você viu o que eu ouvi?
description.italian: Hai visto anche tu quello che ho sentito?
description.japanese: 私に聞こえていることを見たことがありますか？
description.schinese: 你能看到我听到的东西吗？

description.english: Paint all the views that Deaf enjoyed.
description.tchinese: 畫出所有失聰喜歡的景色。
description.german: Male all die Aussichten, die Taub genossen hat
description.french: Peignez toutes les vues que Sourd a appréciées.
description.spanish: Dibuja todos los paisajes que le gustaron a Sordo.
description.russian: Нарисуйте все виды, которые понравились Глухому.
description.brazilian: Pinte todas as imagens que o Surdo gostou.
description.italian: Dipingi tutte le viste che Sordo ha apprezzato
description.japanese: デフが楽しんだすべての景色を色付けしよう。
description.schinese: 画出所有失聪喜欢的景物

description.english: Play on all instruments in game.
description.tchinese: 演奏遊戲中的所有樂器。
description.german: Spiele auf allen Instrumenten im Spiel
description.french: Jouez de chaque instrument présent dans le jeu.
description.spanish: Toca todos los instrumentos del juego.
description.russian: Сыграйте на всех инструментах в игре.
description.brazilian: Toque todos os instrumentos no jogo.
description.polish: Zagraj na wszystkich instrumentach w grze
description.italian: Suona tutti gli strumenti nel gioco
description.japanese: ゲーム内のすべての楽器を演奏しよう。
description.schinese: 演奏游戏中的所有乐器

description.english: Flash all resin-powered objects in game
description.tchinese: 點亮遊戲中所有由樹脂驅動的物體。
description.german: Lass alle von Harz angetriebenen Objekte im Spiel aufleuchten
description.french: Éclairez tous les objets du jeu fonctionnant avec la Résine
description.spanish: Proporciona energía a todos los objetos del juego que funcionan con resina.
description.russian: Озарите вспышкой все предметы в игре, работающие на смоле
description.brazilian: Dê energia a todos os objetos movidos a resina no jogo
description.polish: Rozświetl wszystkie zasilane żywicą obiekty w grze
description.italian: Fai brillare tutti gli oggetti alimentati a Resina nel gioco
description.japanese: レジンを動力源となっている、ゲーム内のすべてのオブジェクトを光らせよう。
description.schinese: 点亮游戏中所有以树脂为动力的物体
